attributes.action: stop baby p's mum getting a new identity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the members of stop baby p's mum getting a new identity  which is on facebook wish for action to be taken to stop this happaning we feel people do such crimes should never be offered new identity's but take the punishment with thre birth identity not rewarded with a new one so they can start a new life

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
